commands.description: Specify one or more multiple keywords that correspond to the respective role to be assigned to it. e.g: !addrole cs math phys ow senior
List all of the self-assignable roles
Enter the departmen/subject code/course number to retrieve a list of courses for the Fall 2018 Semester. e.g: Computer Science/CSI/404
Provides the weather for the city specified. e.g: !weather albany, NY
View the total XP acquired based on chat activity
View the top 10 leaderboards for total user XP
